website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, if you want a portable heater that's suitable for larger areas and offers a beautiful look, this quartz infrared faux fireplace model has a lot to offer.
pros: Generates praise for its attractive design that resembles an oak fireplace with fire glow that looks realistic
Heats areas up to 1,000 square feet with efficient infrared heat
Has casters that make it easy to move
cons: Some faulty models have been reported
A few quality-control issues noted, as some units have arrived damaged

customer_reviews.title: Just Don't Do It.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this fireplace when it worked. Then the fan stopped. But you say to yourself "what about the warranty". Every number you try from Lifesmart automatically hangs up. I also emailed them three times with no reply. Do yourself a favor and avoid this! If the company won't back up their product, you are pretty much at the mercy of the cheap Chinese components holding up. Mine lasted a year.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It's so cozy
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's so cozy! And it puts out so much heat. It makes noise but it's like white noise so it doesn't bother me. It kept my living room and bedroom warm and I live in a drafty apartment with hardwood floors and 10 ft ceilings. This was perfect! It made winter tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline S

customer_reviews.title: Mine arrived with no damage and looks pretty nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with no damage and looks pretty nice for the price. The flame effect isn’t all that realistic but out of the corner of your eye it looks great. It’s pretty quiet and puts out decent heat, not sure how anyone would be able to heat any large room with it. It’s worth the money and I’m overall happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Wolfeman

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I hoped, but delivers where it matters
customer_reviews.text: We are in the process of refinishing our basement and plan on putting in a heat pump, but needed something to heat the 1,000+ sq ft insulated space in the meantime. Spent sometime researching electric options, and this seemed the best option without spending a ton of money. It does the job perfectly. It took about 16 hours to get the space up to temperature (70 degrees) but has since maintained it nicely. Only negative I have to say, is the unit is smaller than I was anticipating. But that certainly isn't a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and your time
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received had a cracked cabinet and only half of the logs were lit. I received a replacement yesterday and the cabinet was busted worse than the first. I never took it out of the packing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could cause a fire
customer_reviews.text: I received this heater on the 9th, on the 15th the fan quit so now all my heater does is over heat which is very dangerous and could cause a fire in only 6 days ..... I know this just could be one bad apple, but you should be careful with this heater . I will update review with what happens next : if they replace or refund etc
customer_reviews.author: Seth C

customer_reviews.title: It's not a great picture of it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my medical office...to give it some ambience for my counseling sessions. It's not a great picture of it, but my patients really love its look and feel of the space - and the fact that it has a heater in it, even better!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix7!

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed. I am hoping the replacement will be better
customer_reviews.text: waiting on a replacement . when I got it the fire inside the heater wouldn't work, the motor inside the heater would not turn and was broken from the inside wall, makes a weird noise when it runs and had missing pieces of wood from the back/outside. I was very disappointed. I am hoping the replacement will be better. if not I will be returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Conway

customer_reviews.title: No Chimney No Problem
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is absolutely fantastic! Unfortunately, we don't have a chimney in our home but purchasing this fireplace has resolved that issue. The infrared heat is the way to go and this unit can heat up a room in just a few minutes. There is truly a positive difference in warmth versus other heating devices. Infrared works like the sun in some ways. It looks great and it is well made. Be mindful that the front grate can get hot so fingers should stay clear. With that we are very satisfied with this fireplace. The holidays are at a whole new level! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Grammo

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking unit. Good quality and runs quietly. The remote control is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little heater. Original purchase arrived with damage to the wood cabinet. Amazon made good and replaced it within a couple of days. Second one is in perfect condition. Bought this model to replace an E-Flame electric fireplace which developed a fault, yet E-flame does not sell replacement parts, which made me really upset. I opted for the Lifesmart heater which has a replacement parts list in the owners manual. At least this one isn't "disposable". The remote control is also a nice feature to have.
customer_reviews.author: eddysauto

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Watch Cord Length
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Lifesmart Fireplace - my first one lasted almost 3 years with heavy use during winter months. I had no hesitation ordering a newer model this year. Although the directions state not to use TV on top, my stand has plenty of ventilation with space behind and on both sides. The exterior does not become "hot." The only caution I offer is -- the plug MUST go directly into wall. Please measure distance to your location and available outlet. Customer Service was very emphatic about this -- no extension cords.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for maybe one year, and started to suddenly quit, and had to be unplugged and plugged back in and then would only work for a few minutes. The company is EXTREMELY difficult to contact for problems, and when I did get a reply, I was sent a motherboard that I had to replace. It worked for a couple of months, and quit again. Your best bet is to buy something local, for better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't that impressed by heat output for watts consumed
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to upgrade the "Optimus H-9010 Garage/Shop Ceiling or Wall Mount Utility Heater" I currently have in my garage. If you leave it on for a long time 2+ hours the room would get warm and cozy. The unit was relatively attractive and the flame visual was pretty cool. But overall, heat for watts consumed, it was no better, or even worse than my old heater. I found the fan to be a bit noisy too. Only used it for about 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: LukeeB

customer_reviews.title: Frame damaged. Average heat output.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived damaged. The top of the unit had been broken off and both of the top support pieces had broken. The screws that hold the heater to the frame are missing; therefore the entire frame will fall forward while the heater falls back. The device cannot be moved because it is so unstable. As far as heat. I suppose it's fine. Not overwhelming but adequate for a VERY small room...like a bathroom or closet. The burning wood feature is pretty. Not sure how long this will last considering its damage.
customer_reviews.author: MUTT WONDERDUCK

customer_reviews.title: cozy & warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini fireplace. I was hoping the wood color was a little bit browner, but it's hard to detect color on a computer and I have gotten used to the color now and actually love it. It heats this room incredibly....as a matter of fact I have to turn it down all the time. I had one pretty much like this one previously for 5 years and I highly recommend this brand. It truly is a deal and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Lieber

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item about a year and half ago and it has already stopped working. Gave it a 2 star because in the beginning it did give off good heat. The remote you must be pointing it right at it from a close distance for it to work. This was my 2nd one the first one I received was damaged. Should just cancelled the order altogether now that it has stopped working
customer_reviews.author: evsess

customer_reviews.title: Condo living
customer_reviews.text: This was a God Sent! The heater in our condo stopped working as well as the fireplace. We are leasing so the owner had it replaced, but it took several days when it was really cold. This little unit totally saved us. We placed it in front on the non working fireplace. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie @ the Beach

customer_reviews.title: Will not Power off
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's room and he cannot turn the thing off. It will sometimes now turn off. My son has to come tell me and I have to pull the plug out from the wall. The control buttons are not consistent when pressed. This would be a fire overheating issue if it does not power off.
customer_reviews.author: Halle Meas

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was worried about ordering this, but I took a chance and I’m so happy I did! The heater is great! It was not damaged during shipping (shipped with FedEx). The amount of heat it puts out is fantastic! I use it to heat our bedroom and master bath on chilly days. You can adjust how hot or cool and it comes with a remote. I am so pleased and I highly recommend this. It is smaller than typical heaters, but that’s what I needed for the space I have. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F. Roadcap

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed ....
customer_reviews.text: I had a new sun room added to our house and was looking for a large room space heater , well , it heats , but the room is only 192 sq.ft. and it does not heat this room as I was expecting. I guess their definition of large room is quite different that mine. It arrived on time and the flame effect is nice but now I am looking for another heater to help this one heat my small room.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wheat

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 74 year old mother, who is always cold, as a Christmas present. She loved it!!!! Heats up her space very well and the flame is awesome to watch!! Wish it was a little bigger but overall a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: KevinSpencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my large family room
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater. We bought this for our rather large and very long family/ dining room as the main heat source. The propane fire place that's out here now is not energy efficient and the propane bill is so high so we decided not to use it this year. Great decision. It not only looks nice, but it warms up the room great, its not loud, it doesn't feel warm to the touch and I have no fear of the cats jumping on it and burning their paws. Great buy. And best part my electric bill has not gone through the roof
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyF

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as expected, but will work nicely if you have central heating
customer_reviews.text: I don't have central heating and previously had a heater very similar to this one. Long story short, I don't have that one any more. I found this one on Amazon and it looks very similar so I bought it expecting similar performance. The heater will work well as a supplement to central heating, but it really doesn't produce a ton of heat. It is okay at circulating warm air within about five-ten feet. Beyond that, it's kind of meh.
customer_reviews.author: Dunning-Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Popped this out of its hideous case to install in a fake fireplace I built. Looks awesome, flames are realistic, and it puts out plenty of heat for our 16' square living room.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Fellner

customer_reviews.title: It is more than a space heater!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep our living room warm when watching tv, as we generally keep our house at 62 degrees. We expected a hike in our electric bill but were pleasantly surprised to find our electric bill dropped 20$/month as the heater actually kept the big furnace from going on.
customer_reviews.author: stephen weaver

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and warm
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 stars for durability because our unit came with damage to the back similar to what other reviews pictured... Everything visible on the front/sides is perfect, though. Its sturdy and easy to use. We haven't used the remote, but have been running the heater mostly every day for 6+ weeks now. It doesn't put off any more heat than the small $30 space heaters we bought, but if the ambience is important to you it's worth the extra $.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater. We had a room with a cold spot but didn't want to increase the heat overall in the house. This works great and looks great. We are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda L

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Our house is really old and gets pretty cold in the winter. Our gas stove in the living room took a crap so we thought we would take our chances with one of these since money is so tight... So far it's working pretty awesome! I'm impressed so far, hasn't got to single digits outside yet but it's been in the 20s and it's been working really well. And with the look of the fire place makes a really cozy in there
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Vikki Batson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in box....twice.
customer_reviews.text: First purchase the bottom wooden base was split and broken inside the box. Didn’t even pull the heater completely out before I sent it back. But... the reviews were good and it was the perfect size so I had it replaced, can’t happen twice can it? Yep the replacement is cracked and missing screws in the back. Three times? Well, returns and shipping on their dime not mine. I’ll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Cheap case.nice fire
customer_reviews.text: Our old Amish built fireplace heater finally gave out and bought this one to replace...SUPER CHEAP wooden case..Came broken..I can't imagine how one of these would would ever arrive unbroken the way it's built. Amazon refunded %25 for this and I fixed..Nice fireplace and heater, but the case is not only cheap built, but looks super cheap..
customer_reviews.author: BubbaBoy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy this heater due to all the bad reviews but it had everything I was looking for so I took the risk. I have to tell you we are so pleased in the operation, quietness, heating, color and an added plus is it is on wheels! I am so happy with it and just had to share. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! We could not survive cold temps without it
customer_reviews.text: Guys, this heater is amazing! We live in an old home and have no other heat source right now last year we only had an oil heater and a space heater. They did NOTHING. This thing toasts us out of the room and helps our rooms with the oil heaters stay warm. I cannot recommend this enough! I am SUPER impressed especially for the price like what!? If you need a room warm and then some, then get this one!! The ambience is nice too :) it is small like people say, but great for our home. Little but mighty!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla billups

customer_reviews.title: It was nice to look at but did not "heat" the living ...
customer_reviews.text: This came with some minor damage to the wood which I would have overlooked, but this unit just does not heat the way described. It was nice to look at but did not "heat" the living room in which it was placed. (15 x 18). Disappointed b./c the "fire" was pretty to have in the room, although much smaller than I imagined, but the dimensions were clearly listed. The seller did agree to a return without any hassle.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Performs its duty.
customer_reviews.text: Heats well. Does it's job,we utilize for 250 square foot room . My husband wished it looked a little nicer, not so cheap. Me on the other hand I was happy with product and the wood case. Flames are about as realistic as expected. Not cheesy.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M Berg

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do what we expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Liking it so far. We have to set the temperature on 80 maintain 74 but that's OK.
customer_reviews.author: edward c kent

customer_reviews.title: I got more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This little beaut kicks out some heat, has multiple settings for the fire light, and a pretty impressive blower. My daughter was hogging it all the time until my son stole it away to the upstairs. Great value in my opinion. I haven't had it long enough to determine durability, but if my kids haven't broken it yet it is a win and I have nothing to share on the remote control (sorry, I don't know).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Discussed
customer_reviews.text: The package was received today once opened Isee screws fallout but the system is put together already so when I turn the system around the system all broken up like this been sent back and then sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No assembly
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It looks very life like. I appreciate it came already set up. Other infrared heaters I looked at had significant assembly. This came straight out of the box ready to be plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: lorp

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my grandmother who is always cold. I was kind of worried as she never turns this off. But this is the most cost efficient heater ever. After the room gets to temperature it turns itself off while still providing that warm feel of the fireplace burning, which she likes. I am very pleased with this product. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Replacing items MISSING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my insert and everything about it was as described except that the manufacturer failed to include the remote and manual😡. And they will NOT send another remote but are making me return the unit weighing 40 lbs for another new unit! How idiotic is that. So not sure would recommend getting from this particular manufacturer until they change their policy. Very upset customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlsa Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: This product is not as tall as I would like. I purchased a different product a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as tall as I would like. I purchased a different product a couple of years ago and loved it so much. As I started shopping the other product was no longer available so after reading reviews I select this one. It arrived fast and no damages; box was heavy 50lbs. However, once unloaded from box it's very easy to push and set up in room. Cons: Power cord short in length, remote control is very poor made "buttons stick" Pros: Heats room in minutes, easy to wheel on floor, PRICE
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeMemberoCa

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful, and warms the entire apartment I live in
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day. It is beautiful, and warms the entire apartment I live in. The only negative, and the information is clearly stated is the small size. I wish it were taller, because it is an awkward height. I have resolved that problem by building a base for the fireplace to sit on. It's lovely, it does a great job, and it wasn't terribly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: acwibw

customer_reviews.title: wow talk about heat
customer_reviews.text: restoring old 1845 home in Luray VA. Needed heat upstairs in den and bedroom. Set at 72 degrees for 700sq. feet of space and you will wake up in a sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice fireplace. While the dimensions are clearly written in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice fireplace. While the dimensions are clearly written in the description, it is not nearly as big as I thought it would be. It works great though and blows out some nice heat. I bought it for my wife as a Christmas present and she loves it. It's a little small in our living room, so we're going to put it in our bedroom. It shipped in the factory box, so if you're buying it as a gift, know that it won't be covered up or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the family
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother-in-law because she loves to sit by a fire but didn't have the room in her home for a fire place she fell in love with this it just plugs in a 110 volt power and with the remote she just sits in her chair and watches it, was really pleased with the shipping was packed really well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Naquin

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price and they look great.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Doesn't heat as large an area as I thought it would but for the purposes I need them for it will work great. We live in a rural area where the electricity can go off anytime for days at at time. I purchased three of these. They can plug into our generator and provide enough heat so the pipes and us don't freeze. My husband had a steel garage shell put up this summer but hasn't had time to get the heating so this will do fine if he has to work on a car for us in the cold weather this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Faye S

customer_reviews.title: Not damaged, works well, but be home for delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were wrong (at least for my order)! My package came not by UPS, but by an two person Amazon team. I live in Seattle so that might have something to do with it. The box was large and heavy but the heater itself was light and easy to move. BE SURE TO BE HOME WHEN TJIS ARRIVES! Since it wasn't small enough to leave by the door toy apartment building and brought to me not by traditional package services, it was good that I was able to let the package deliverers inside.
customer_reviews.author: Rio Faltys-Burr

customer_reviews.title: Horriblely sent to us
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible charged me almost 90 for crap no remote had it boxed in a good box box under it was horrible then when my husband got it out was in peases could at least give my shipping back thanking about calling news let them do a deal on this thang wish I knew how to put pictures
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  Grothe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is not our first fireplace heater but it is the best so far! I really like the thermostat. It heats the room to perfect temp then the heater turns off leaving the pretty flame on. This was a great choice, we had looked at several before deciding on this one.
customer_reviews.author: afnavymom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ambiance!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my location--color not quite what I was expecting--great that it's on casters.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Great little affordable fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Works great, warms the area we needed nicely. Our only minor grumble is the sound that is made when the 'flames' are on. It's not terrible, but it can seem loud & does get on my husbands nerves after a bit, especially when the house is on the quiet side. Definitely not a deal breaker, the flames can be turned off anyway and it's a nice and affordable little fireplace heater.
customer_reviews.author: malysway

customer_reviews.title: Lovely machine
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is it came damaged because it was incredibly poorly packaged. They really need to work on that. I will live with the damage because I have no idea how I would return it. However, it really does have a beautifully real fire look about it and I know I will enjoy it in the coming winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: It’s reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: The remote thermostat has been wonderful with he crazy Spring weather. It’s quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Overly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Used this by itself to heat an 1800sq ft home. It snowed this winter it rained it was in the twenties and thirties and this thing has ran non stop for over a month. The home stays at about 67° my electric bill went up about $70 running this nonstop.
customer_reviews.author: C. A.

customer_reviews.title: great addition to any room
customer_reviews.text: works really well if you are looking to warm up a room without cranking up the furnace for the entire house. Glad I got it, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Escude

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater in January 2020. It worked great for the couple of months during winter. Of course I didn’t need it during the summer. Turned it on here last week to get the chill out of the room. It worked for a couple of hours, kicked off and would not blow out any heat. For what I paid, it should last a whole lot longer than 2 1/2 months! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Heats good
customer_reviews.text: The wood is cheaply made but for heating it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: Love this fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this fireplace. Great price, quality product, gorgeous wood. It creates a nice ambiance and also works well as a zone heater (I use it in a small room). I've been using this for 2 years and have had no issues. I will probably be buying another of these for another room in my house. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Light effect is not working
customer_reviews.text: It came today 12/10/18. It is clean and looks nice and it was assembled. However the light effects is not working. I took the bulb out and tested them and they are fine. The aluminum foil rotator is turning but no light. I am not sure what to do and I feel like I am stucked with it as it is not worth to pay for shipping back. Also, the shipping box was damaged. So packing it will be very costly. I am very angry and disappointed. I would rated nice but if it was working.
customer_reviews.author: US-Product LLC

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work upon arrival. The unit was damaged as well. Sent it right back. Definitely don’t purchase this item. It took over two weeks just to receive it, and then it doesn’t even work properly. Unit was plugged in and turned on by itself, blasting heat. None of the buttons worked on the unit to control it, and the remote did nothing. In order to turn it off, it had to be unplugged. Definitely not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking item, compact and very effective. Unfortunately after only 5 months the unit is making a loud sound. Still heats and lights up, but is making a continuous loud noise. Hopefully the manufacturer will help resolve this problem and then I can update my review.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Product Arrived Damaged but Repairable!
customer_reviews.text: A great little cozy heater, arrived on time and usable, but arrived in a damaged condition. Specifically in the upper right corner where the metal heating unit screws into the presswood. It should be fine once the screws and bracket are removed and the presswood glued and clamped back together. The repairs are less troublesome than re-boxing and shipping the unit back.
customer_reviews.author: Apalachicola Mayor Van Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Mobility and efficiency of the electric fireplace was amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Great compact electric fireplace. It got wheels so was easy to move around. Remote control has pretty good range and the heater warms up decent size room (living room) in my case in a matter of minutes. Seller was quick and helpful in responding to my questions. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Aj Strong

customer_reviews.title: Received with damage
customer_reviews.text: This heater works fine but it was shipped with a big chip in the wood in the back, and a chip in the front. Box was fine, so a damaged unit was shipped. Amazon's choice is return (heavy and very inconvenient to return), or keep.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the room and adds warmth and ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Compact little fireplace with realistic flames. Looks great in the room and adds warmth and ambiance. Recipients were delighted. Comes in one box easy to unpack and plug in. Has wheels so it can be moved to different areas if needed.
customer_reviews.author: pegleg997

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and seems to be built well
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and seems to be built well, so on that front I have no problems. Keeps me warm. My complaints come in the controls. I find the temperature setting hard to read as the front slats extend all the way across. The slats on the front are metal and set in place so you can't aim them at all. Want it to blow on you as you lay on the couch? better get a 3 foot high stool to put it on. Also I wish there was a setting to just turn on the fireplace lights without the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love this fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I love this fireplace. I like that it has different heat settings and that it automatically turns off once that heat level has been reached. The fan blows the heat forward so that the fireplace itself doesn't get hot, which works out great for my cat since she seems to be mesmerized by the flames. The "fire" looks pretty realistic and is very soothing to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Ambiance is great
customer_reviews.text: I love it but remote doesn’t work. It is so cheerful!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Quigley

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a great electric fireplace to heat a room
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a great electric fireplace to heat a room, this is the one! Purchased two of these for my bedroom and game room and they work like a charm. Items arrived a bit damage on the corners but it would cost too much to send back so I’m keeping them. Heats a 20x20 room with no issues and the flame settings are nice! It’s worth the cost! I’ve seen other electric fireplaces for more money that aren’t as good as this one! If your looking for something inexpensive and just enough of that real fireplace look, this is your product!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Ray

customer_reviews.title: Maybe, I am simple, but I have really enjoyed my fake fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the infra-red fireplace last winter during some really dreary weather. The spa that I occasionally visit has one in their "quiet room". So i created my own quiet area in our bedroom. I turn on the fireplace every morning while we drink our coffee. The glow creates a nice relaxing ambience that even the cat seems to like. I rarely use the heat feature but once when I needed it, it was able to heat the room when our furnace was not working.
customer_reviews.author: peaceofmind

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely loud when it’s on, and its still very loud even after it’s been turned off. Very disappointed, going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: It Fits My  Needs
customer_reviews.text: It's small but beautiful. It heats my 18x28 bedroom in nothing flat. The pseudo flames work without turning on the heat. I get mesmerized by sight just watching them, the same as being in front of a real fire. This size is perfect for me and since I am kinda lazy the remote control is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: The temperature controller makes it easy to "set it and forget it" when we're trying ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these in our home now and they work wonders. The temperature controller makes it easy to "set it and forget it" when we're trying to maintain a cozy atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: featherless

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Mother in-law she loved it. she said it keep their living room very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's room. Work's better than omish heater and saved a lot of Money
customer_reviews.author: Mildred L Pelkey

customer_reviews.title: Nice fireplace but Remote breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: This a a nice looking w mantle fireplace but the remote is cheaply made, on/off button doesn’t work . Contacted company to purchase replacement remote with none available..
customer_reviews.author: sunnysett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.text: I have it in an unseated room and if I turn it on for a bit, I can enjoy my porch for several hours a day. So glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lawe

customer_reviews.title: absolutely beautyful fireplace display. Large, one of the best.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to warm the room as good as other electric fireplaces I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: This did work well, but now does not.  Heating element has shorted out.
customer_reviews.text: We love this. It really works well, and with our 2 year old we don't have to worry about him burning himself with a real fire. Well worth the money. After exactly 2 years the heater has shorted out. I am looking for a replacement heating element because the wood case is still perfect. Only reason this keeps a 3 start rating.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton D. Hart

customer_reviews.title: which does the job better, but without the faux flames
customer_reviews.text: This is a an attractive addition to the ambiance of my studio, with adequate heat. I also have a ceramic heater, which does the job better, but without the faux flames. So I am happy to have both! The cat loves the flames.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Electric fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This little electric fireplace puts out some heat. However, it looked bigger than it was. I had a space that I needed this to fill, and it fell very short of what I needed. I gave it to my neighbor and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette  Aldape

customer_reviews.title: Small Fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: Small fireplace is nice and works great..best part is you can roll it anywhere in the house..Only problem is that the PACKAGING needs to be better..my order came with small chip in the back where screw holds fireplace insert..Amazon took 20% off..
customer_reviews.author: JRBASE

customer_reviews.title: Good Heater but Problem
customer_reviews.text: Received box on time with no external damage. However, there were 3-4 layers of the clear shipping tape? The box appeared to have been opened. New unit? There was a crack in the 1/2" wood strip in the back of the unit below the mantel (see pic). Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater. Works well for a large space.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and works well with multiple setting for power consumption. Heats evenly and has good warmth. Did the 'buy again' option and was sent two different models that also work well, but are smaller and look slightly different.
customer_reviews.author: J. LaFleur

customer_reviews.title: Great little fireplace heater!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, I am really happy with it! Doesn't warm the room as quickly as I had hoped, but still great! The flames are random so theyre fairly realistic and the burning logs look quite realistic. The wheels were already installed so it only had to be plugged in to start using it. It arrived without a single flaw too. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Amundsen

customer_reviews.title: Not going to warm up a small area...
customer_reviews.text: It does NOT work as a heater. It did not warm up my kitchen. I went out and bought a different fake fireplace heater, that works!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Simply dangerous and poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Got burned on this one. Error codes and a total lack of trust in this product. The one it replaced was 15 years old. Beware of amazon warehouse deals.
customer_reviews.author: Masshole in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Set this to the temperature you want and it does the job. We have this in are 37 foot Fifth Wheel, heat the front room and Kitchen keeps it constant 70 degrees. Good bang for the buck. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: randyave

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This heater looks good and is a nice addition to the room. Having a remote is nice. Currently sits in a 600 sq ft room. I set it to 65 and it has yet to shut off which means it doesn’t ever get the room that warm.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Flames so realistic and natural looking
customer_reviews.text: My friend had to move and her other place didn’t have a fireplace like her other one. She cried when she got it and seen it on she won’t turn it off. The flames are so realistic so natural
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Power bill doubled
customer_reviews.text: All in all it works great to heat the room and I like that it has the different temperature control and it's very visually pleasing as well, the only downside is my power bill literally doubled with this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heater for a large room..ambiance included!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ! The best electric heater I have ever purchased! The ambiance of the moving flames are fantastic alone but the heat this puts out is amazing! I highly recommend this fine product to anyone looking for a good large room heater that also includes great ambiance for relaxation!
customer_reviews.author: Coral Shaull

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace was too large for my room, so we put it downstairs in thwe family room. The flames are realistic and it's box is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: aunt emma

customer_reviews.title: The unit arrived with the framing in the back broken ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived with the framing in the back broken with no attachment screws holding the top portion of the rear framing. The heater works but some form of refund should be distributed for receiving a product that is damaged
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Nice fireplace and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money and works well in my 24x36 foot room and was packaged very well and did not have any issues with it. This was a replacement for a similar unit and the remote on this one is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish, and cozy flame make it an ideal ...
customer_reviews.text: Infrared is the way to go. Heated the downstairs of an old Victorian house (1800 sq. ft.). Beautiful finish,and cozy flame make it an ideal warmth to any home. The flame has 3 settings of brightness, or no flame. Considering purchasing a second one, for the upstairs. Currently there is no primary heat in the house, so I was amazed how much heat it put out. Cool to the touch, when disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Showe

customer_reviews.title: This heater is awesome !
customer_reviews.text: It heats my large living room great. I will probably buy another one this fall for the bedroom. I have no need to heat the whole house when I usually only need 2 rooms warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes winter nights not only warm but cozy as well
customer_reviews.text: Have it in the bedroom to keep me toasty warm. Came already put together... I just plugged it up and all set. Very important is that it truly is cool to the touch; only hot air blows out. That is the most important safety feature! The only thing wrong is the picture shows 2 remotes... it only came with 1
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This showed up at my door completely beat up. There are scuffs all over one side of it, and I even found a piece of the wood at the bottom of the box. It also had no remote with it. I contacted LifeSmart to let them know and received an email back that they basically didn't care. I would recommend buying from a different company. Rated 2 stars because the flame looks nice, otherwise, it is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jarred Mill

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: They put a sticker on the mantel that pulls the “finished oak” off. I paid less for a better heater with another company. Very poor quality for a premium price. Right on the top of the mantle. Ruined out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger F.W. Morrigan

product_meta.title: Lifesmart Large Room Infrared Quartz Fireplace in Burnished Oak Finish w/Remote
product_meta.description:
The Lifesmart Infrared Fireplace can be installed anywhere since no venting is required. Imagine the warmth and beauty of a fireplace anywhere in your home with no costly installation. A beautiful Oak mantle surrounds every fireplace to match your décor. Unlike most electric fireplaces this is truly an Infrared Heater made to heat a large room. Our Fireplace uses 3 commercial grade quartz infrared elements to produce a soft, cozy heat. All electrical components are warrantied for 1 year. This fireplace is ideal for zone heating only uses up to 1500 watts which is no more than a common hair dryer! Simply plug into a standard 15 amp 110 volt outlet and enjoy. The fireplace produces a beautiful & realistic dancing flames just like a real fire. The Fireplace may be operated with or without heat so you can enjoy the ambiance year round. A quiet scroll fan helps circulates the heat. A new larger remote control is also included to operate your fireplace from across the room. This Lifesmart Fireplace comes with E-Z glide casters and will make a welcome addition to your family room, living room, basement or bedroom.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Lifesmart Life Pro Infrared Fireplace can be installed anywhere since no venting is required. Imagine the warmth and beauty of a fireplace anywhere in your home with no costly installation. A beautiful Oak mantle surrounds every fireplace to match your décor. Unlike most electric fireplaces this is truly an Infrared Heater made to heat a large room. Our Fireplace uses 3 commercial grade quartz infrared elements to produce a soft, cozy heat. All electrical components are warrantied for 1 yearThis fireplace is ideal for zone heating only uses up to 1500 watts which is no more than a common hair dryer! Simply plug into a standard 15 amp 110 volt outlet and enjoy. The fireplace produces a beautiful & realistic dancing flames just like a real fire. The Fireplace may be operated with or without heat so you can enjoy the ambiance year round. A quiet scroll fan helps circulates the heat. A new larger remote control is also included to operate your fireplace from across the room. This Lifesmart Life Pro Fireplace comes with E-Z glide casters and will make a welcome addition to your family room, living room, basement or bedroom.
feature_bullets: Features a Quakerstown dark oak cabinet and mantel
Two levels of realistic fire glow
Produces natural, quiet, and efficient infrared heat
